mapper.insert: insert into dormitory_management_system.dormitory(building_id, name, bed_number, update_time, unit_number, floor_number) VALUES (#{buildingId}, #{name}, #{bedNumber}, now(), #{unitNumber}, #{floorNumber})
mapper.update: update dormitory_management_system.dormitory set name=#{name}, unit_number=#{unitNumber}, floor_number=#{floorNumber}, bed_number=#{bedNumber}, picture=#{picture}, update_time=now(), building_id=#{buildingId} where id = #{id}
